content: count my blessings shawl designed by ursula wood ~ omgrannysquare very easy crochet pattern please use #countmyblessingsshawl when posting on social media materials used recommended red heart it s a wrap rainbow 150g 600m 2 weight yarn 45% cotton/55% acrylic blend size 4mm crochet hook wool needle to work in ends scissors 4x stitch markers optional abbreviations chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet sts - stitches st - stitch yo - yarn over hook slip_stitch - slip_stitch skip - skip count my blessings shawl by ursula wood page 2 of 6 notes *making the bobble = ch7 make 7dc into 4th chain from the hook but do not complete each double_crochet s last step so that you have 8sts on the hook yo and pull through all 8 loops on the hook so that only 1st remain on hook now work a slip_stitch in the same st where the bobble started this lets the bobble fold over on itself bobble is now complete *the ch1 at the start of a row does not count as anything it simply helps create a smooth edge *start of each row ch1 2dc in the first st *2dc-cluster mentioned in row 15 onwards refers to 2dc worked in the same stitch in previous row *end of each row work 2dc in the last st turn work pattern click here for the video tutorial of this pattern row 1 ch4 first chain counts as magic_ring 3ch counts as first double_crochet work 5dc in first chain made turn work 6sts total row 2 ch1 2dc in the first st work 2dc in each st until 1st remains work 2dc in the last st turn work 12sts total row 3 ch1 2dc in the first st * 1dc in next st 2dc in next st repeat pattern from * until 1st remain work 2dc in the last st turn work 19sts in total row 4 ch1 2dc in the first st * 1dc in next st 1dc in next st 2dc in next st repeat pattern from * until 3sts remain 1dc in next st 1dc in next st work 2dc in the last st turn work 26sts total row 5 ch1 2dc in the first st * ch1 skip next st 1dc in next st repeat pattern from * until 1st remain work 2dc in the last st turn work 28sts total row 6 ch1 2dc in the first st * 1dc in each of next 4sts 2dc in next st repeat pattern from * until 2sts remain 1dc in next st work 2dc in the last st turn work 35sts total row 7 ch1 2dc in the first st work 1dc in next st work 2dc in next st * work 1dc in each of next 5sts work 2dc in next st repeat pattern from * until 2sts remain work 1dc in next st work 2dc in the last st turn work 43sts total row 8 ch1 2dc in the first st
